Reviews.Title: “Good location but poor standard”
Reviews.Author: Inake
Reviews.Content: stayed nights aviatic hotel booked double tripple family location montparnasse close metro station rer station connection charles de gaulle airport quiet little noise night free internet tea facilities clean sheets towels changed day limited hours checkin checkout closed hours middle day nights informed advance email bathrooms worn beds screws sticking floor covered thick dirty rug shower cabin renovation cheap broken pump shower fixed couldnt move sink low price matching interior

Reviews.Title: “Very good value for money”
Reviews.Author: ChelmsfordLil
Reviews.Content: value money found near montparnasse centre paris clean newly redecorated ex kettle tea sugar toilet shower emplacement opposite wonderful baker croissant pain au chocolat morning underground avenue door paris fast evening plenty restaurants transport rue de la montparnasse sit terrasse drink watch people passing

Reviews.Title: “Cheap and disgusting.”
Reviews.Author: kinejosefine
Reviews.Content: sister stayed paris days march 2011 hotel aviatic rue montparnasse list beaware considering hotel heat march pretty cold paris night freezing bedlinnen dirty slept dressed cold cuz didnt sleep close sheets bathroom disgusting belive mold shower receptionist helpfull friendly wierd smell kitchen door cheap hotel ok low standards planning spend time hotel ok please bring children hotel am afraid

Reviews.Title: “Dirty, fusty, awful”

Reviews.Content: weve fusty 24 wall wet dirty smell understand star hotel cleanness lack hotel services weve nice hotel relaxing tiring day smell surprising disappointing worst paris dirty fusty rented refused

Reviews.Title: “Just barely OK”

Reviews.Content: stayed hotel highly recommended friend 2 months little disappointed size staff bathshower awful shower getting ton water bathroom floor front desk person days nice lady hotel hospitality nice ok day front desk person friendly leaving au revoir ignored housekeeper day spoke zero english ok cuz dont americans expects speak language shouldnt line understand word towel cleaned french clueless look didnt saying sighed rolled eyes slammed door shut nice tiny toilet separate bathroom sink bath aside unsanitary aspect touching door handle using toilet getting chance wash ones hands toilet little claustrophobic hotel wasnt bad people especially front desk staff night nice friendly housekeeping staff besides woman described nice beds pillows comfy bathroom clean hotel quiet peaceful liked location short walk montparnasse metro station lot train options walk shopping st germain
